entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Risk of freezing rain. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
